item.title: APSRTC bus overturns in Telanganaâ€™s Gadwal, 20 injured; driver taken into custody
item.description:
<![CDATA[An APSRTC bus travelling from Hyderabad in Telangana to Anantapur in Andhra Pradesh overturned in the early hours of Thursday (February 19, 2026) at Itikyalapadu, Undavelli mandal of Jogulamba Gadwal district, leaving 20 passengers injured. No casualties were reported.
The Andhra Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation (APSRTC) bus, which had started its journey from Ameerpet in Hyderabad, met with the accident at around 4 a.m.. According to Undavelli Police Sub-Inspector, Shekhar, the vehicle...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: RTC Bus Overturns in Gadwal, 20 Passengers Injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: At least 20 passengers suffered injuries after the RTC bus in which they were travelling overturned on NH-44 in Gadwal Jogulamba district on Thursday morning.
Of the 20 injured, the condition of four passengers is said to be critical. Traffic on NH-44 was disrupted for a while following the incident but was later restored.
The accident occurred when the bus was proceeding to Anantapur from Hyderabad. The bus driver apparently lost control and overturned on the highway, causing panic...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author

item.title: Bus Overturns in Jogulamba Gadwal, 19 Injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[An APSRTC bus overturned in Jogulamba Gadwal district, injuring 19 passengers, four of whom are seriously hurt. The accident occurred early on Thursday morning on the national highway at Itikyalapadu in Undavelli mandal. Motorists travelling on the same road responded swiftly and alerted the police. Emergency services reached the scene promptly and transported the injured to Kurnool Government Hospital.
Police confirmed that a case has been registered and an investigation is ongoing. The bus wa...]]>
item.author: Pavan Bandari

item.title: 20 injured as RTC bus from Hyderabad to Anantapur overturns on NH-44 in Gadwal; four critical
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana: An RTC bus travelling from Hyderabad to Anantapur overturned on National Highway 44 in the early hours of Thursday, injuring 20 passengers. Four of them are in critical condition, officials said.
Bus en route to Anantapur loses control
The accident occurred at Itikyala Padu stage in Jogulamba Gadwal district. According to initial reports, the driver lost control of the vehicle, which toppled on the highway.
Local residents and motorists alerted the police and emergency services. Th...]]>
item.author: Harsha Vardhini

item.title: APSRTC bus plunges into roadside ditch in Jogulamba Gadwal, four seriously injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[Apsrtc Bus Plunges Into Roadside Ditch In Jogulamba Gadwal Four Seriously Injured
APSRTC bus plunges into roadside ditch in Jogulamba Gadwal, four seriously injured
Four passengers were seriously injured and 15 sustained minor injuries after an APSRTC bus travelling from Hyderabad to Anantapur veered off National Highway 44 and plunged into a roadside ditch in Jogulamba Gadwal district
By Telangana Today Published Date - 19 February 2026, 09:41 AM
Bus Accident near Gadwal leads to injuries t...]]>
